useCase.name: Manage Room Categories

preconditions.precondition: Admin is logged in and has access to the admin panel

useCase.trigger: Admin wants to add a new room category

mainSequence.step: Admin requests to add a new room category through the UI
UI shows the form to add a new room category
Admin fills in the required details for the new room category
Admin submits the new room category data through the UI
Room category data is processed and added successfully
Success message displaying the added room category is shown to Admin
